Article.ArticleTitle: A novel flavonoid C-glycoside from Sphaeranthus indicus L. (family Compositae).

AbstractText: A novel flavonoid C-glycoside, 5-hydroxy-7-methoxy-6-C-glycosylflavone (1), was isolated from the aerial part of Sphaeranthus indicus. Its structure was elucidated by spectroscopic methods.
